tag.description: ElasticSearch exploitation for Linux boxes AND also aiming Windows machines via a malicious MOF (Managed Object Format) coded in a malicious PHP-MySQL webshell to exploit the WMI (Windows Management Instrumentation) architecture to remotely upload/execute any desired payload for infection

tag_groups.description: A trojan is a type of malware that performs activites without the userâ€™s knowledge. These activities commonly include establishing remote access connections, capturing keyboard input, collecting system information, downloading/uploading files, dropping other malware into the infected system, performing denial-of-service (DoS) attacks, and running/terminating processes.
